name: HINDI Virtual / Online KeyBoard
short_description:
HINDI_VirtualKeyBoard
**********************
Hindi Virtual / online key board is software program, which allows users to enter hindi characters. This virtual / online key board can be operated by various input devices like Mouse, touch pad, external touch tablet etc. This Virtual / Online key boards provides different input mechanisms to disability persons also.
